Everything is toxic unless you are the one doing it

I would love this game, if the ranks weren't so god dam broken.

I have been a rank 14 killer and I have faced a Rank 1 Survivor with the rest under or around rank 5. This game is almost unplayable for new players but for the rest of people is fun and for me is fun but it is just so painful to get smashed completely by people who have all the perks and items and ranks leaving me feeling really fustrated.
If they can fix the ranks I would absolutely recommend this game, but for new people just don't bother.

very good very spooky constant new cool content

A very fun and strategic game to play. If you are looking for a horror game this is NOT it I assumed it was when I first bought it but then when I realised it wasn't I fell in love with the game for different reasons. 

Game is still a little buggy as hit boxes are too big and you can be hit after vaulting or pallet dropping animations but as dbd has made more money it seems they are on the right track to fixing all the issues up (including dedicated servers).

Recommend to anyone with a like for strategy and horror themed characters. 8/10

As a new player im Qued up with veteran or high skilled players constantly due to their poor matchmaking. I started playing this game because of the crossplay ablility. I doubt their player base is so small that they cant fix matchmaking now.
I m not interested in this game before and thin after i'll played i m so amazed it  fun.

This game has it's moments. Something has changed though and now I hear cursing shortly before entering the loading lobby.

Hope your really good with keyboard and mouse because its not an optional skill with this game.
Fun game, but the matchmaking is complete shit. Ive been getting matched with rank 2-5 players while im at rank 19, its unfair to new players to throw them into the game with veterans.

This game is awesome. It was a little annoying when I couldn't party up with my friends but now that that's out of the way, it's perfect. My only complaint would be that all of the maps feel really small and similar to one another.

don't do it

the ranking system is trash, the hitboxes are trash, and everyone i've played against are assholes

i don't get mad often, and even when i do i don't throw things around much, but this game made me accidentally put a dent in my wall

for the sake of your house, don't do it.

Much thanks for BHVR to make me watch Stranger Things. It is an awesome series. But DbD has still issues to be fixed. HITBOXES are the most important because out of all your lost chases , this issue causes them. You fast vault and there is some distance between you and the Killer? Don't be fooled because your hitbox is 3 Jane size larger than you think. I slide through a pallet and I almost finished the slide but the killer is able to hit me because i am still on a pallet even though i am at the far end of it. 4 fucking years this game has been online but we still have these stupid issues. It is a fun game, but bugs are equally annoying as how much fun the game is. They cancel each other out. It's fun and frusturating at the same time. Recommended for grinders. Not recommended for friend groups as it can destroy friendships as fast as Legion make people DC.
This game is full of ups and downs. The community seems to get worse every year but I keep coming back.
